languages.text: "Что же, поскольку ты меня приятно удивил{mf||а}, а также не позволил{mf||а} Инцендии прибрать к рукам мою собственность, я вознагражу тебя. Возьми это грозное оружие — оно отлично показало себя в схватке с ксеносами и помогло добыть более значимый дар, что я привез".

traits.locale_text: "Что же, поскольку ты меня приятно удивил{mf||а}, а также не позволил{mf||а} Инцендии прибрать к рукам мою собственность, я компенсирую твои труды. Есть у меня один славный завоеванный мирок, до которого все никак не дойдут руки. Пусть он пойдет в довесок к более значимому дару, что я привез".

languages.text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I should reward you. Take this grim weapon — it performed superbly in battles against xenos, and it helped me acquire the more substantial gift I have brought."
languages.original_text: "Что же, поскольку ты меня приятно удивил{mf||а}, а также не позволил{mf||а} Инцендии прибрать к рукам мою собственность, я вознагражу тебя. Возьми это грозное оружие — оно отлично показало себя в схватке с ксеносами и помогло добыть более значимый дар, что я привез".

traits.locale_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I should reward you. Take this grim weapon — it performed superbly in battles against xenos, and it helped me acquire the more substantial gift I have brought."

"Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I should reward you. Take this grim weapon — it performed superbly in battles against xenos, and it helped me acquire the more substantial gift I have brought."

"Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I will compensate you for your efforts. I have a nice little world I conquered that I can never seem to get around to. I'll throw it in along with the more substantial gift I have brought."

"Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I will compensate you for your efforts. I have a nice little world I conquered that I can never seem to get around to. I'll throw it in along with the more substantial gift I have brought."

"Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I will compensate you for your efforts. I have a nice little world I conquered that I can never seem to get around to. I'll throw it in along with the more substantial gift I have brought."

languages.text: 「まあ、お前が嬉しいサプライズだと分かった今、俺のものをひったくったインセンディアを止めてくれた尽力には感謝しないとな。俺はちょっとした星を征服したんだが、時間が無くて視察できそうにないんだ。結構な量の贈答品を持ってきたから、それらと一緒にくれてやるよ」
languages.original_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I will compensate you for your efforts. I have a nice little world I conquered that I can never seem to get around to. I'll throw it in along with the more substantial gift I have brought."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、お前が嬉しいサプライズだと分かった今、俺のものをひったくったインセンディアを止めてくれた尽力には感謝しないとな。俺はちょっとした星を征服したんだが、時間が無くて視察できそうにないんだ。結構な量の贈答品を持ってきたから、それらと一緒にくれてやるよ」

languages.text: “既然你给我准备了这样的惊喜，又阻止了因森蒂娅染指我的财产，我也应当给你些补偿才是。我曾经征服过一个不错的小世界，但我始终抽不出时间去打理它。既然如此，我就把这个小玩意放在我其他的贵重礼物里面，一起送给你吧。”
languages.original_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I will compensate you for your efforts. I have a nice little world I conquered that I can never seem to get around to. I'll throw it in along with the more substantial gift I have brought."

traits.locale_text: “既然你给我准备了这样的惊喜，又阻止了因森蒂娅染指我的财产，我也应当给你些补偿才是。我曾经征服过一个不错的小世界，但我始终抽不出时间去打理它。既然如此，我就把这个小玩意放在我其他的贵重礼物里面，一起送给你吧。”

languages.text: «Bueno, puesto que ha resultado ser una sorpresa grata y ha evitado que Incendia me arrebatara mi propiedad, le compensaré sus esfuerzos. Conquisté un pequeño planeta para el que nunca consigo encontrar tiempo. Así que se lo daré además del regalo principal que le traigo».
languages.original_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I will compensate you for your efforts. I have a nice little world I conquered that I can never seem to get around to. I'll throw it in along with the more substantial gift I have brought."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, puesto que ha resultado ser una sorpresa grata y ha evitado que Incendia me arrebatara mi propiedad, le compensaré sus esfuerzos. Conquisté un pequeño planeta para el que nunca consigo encontrar tiempo. Así que se lo daré además del regalo principal que le traigo».

languages.text: « Bon, puisque vous m'avez agréablement surpris et que vous avez empêché Incendia de s'emparer de ma propriété, je vais vous dédommager pour vos efforts. J'ai conquis un petit monde fort sympathique sur lequel je n'ai jamais le temps de me rendre. Je vous en fais cadeau, au même titre que l'autre présent plus substantiel que je vous ai apporté. »
languages.original_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I will compensate you for your efforts. I have a nice little world I conquered that I can never seem to get around to. I'll throw it in along with the more substantial gift I have brought."

traits.locale_text: « Bon, puisque vous m'avez agréablement surpris et que vous avez empêché Incendia de s'emparer de ma propriété, je vais vous dédommager pour vos efforts. J'ai conquis un petit monde fort sympathique sur lequel je n'ai jamais le temps de me rendre. Je vous en fais cadeau, au même titre que l'autre présent plus substantiel que je vous ai apporté. »

languages.text: "Nun, da Ihr Euch als angenehme Überraschung erwiesen und Incendia daran gehindert habt, sich meinen Besitz unter den Nagel zu reißen, werde ich Euch für Eure Bemühungen entschädigen. Ich habe eine hübsche kleine Welt erobert, für die ich einfach keine Zeit finde. Ihr erhaltet sie als Zugabe zu dem größeren Geschenk, das ich mitgebracht habe."
languages.original_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I will compensate you for your efforts. I have a nice little world I conquered that I can never seem to get around to. I'll throw it in along with the more substantial gift I have brought."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, da Ihr Euch als angenehme Überraschung erwiesen und Incendia daran gehindert habt, sich meinen Besitz unter den Nagel zu reißen, werde ich Euch für Eure Bemühungen entschädigen. Ich habe eine hübsche kleine Welt erobert, für die ich einfach keine Zeit finde. Ihr erhaltet sie als Zugabe zu dem größeren Geschenk, das ich mitgebracht habe."

languages.text: "Pekâlâ, hoş bir sürpriz sunup İncendia'nın mülkümü çalmasını engellediğin için çabalarının karşılığını vereceğim. Fethettiğim güzel, küçük bir dünyam var. Ancak pek uyuşamıyoruz. Daha değerli bir hediye verecektim zaten, yanına bu dünyayı da katıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I will compensate you for your efforts. I have a nice little world I conquered that I can never seem to get around to. I'll throw it in along with the more substantial gift I have brought."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ, hoş bir sürpriz sunduğun ve İncendia'nın mülkümü çalmasını engellediğin için çabalarının karşılığını vereceğim. Fethettiğim güzel, küçük bir dünyam var; kendisiyle pek uyuşamıyoruz. Daha önemli bir hediyem olacaktı, yanına bu dünyayı da katacağım."
